plurals.name: kg_password_default_pin_message
plurals.item: Enter SIM PIN. You have %d remaining attempts.
Enter SIM PIN. You have %d remaining attempt before you must contact your operator to unlock your device.

plurals.name: kg_password_default_pin_message_multi_sim
plurals.item: Please Enter the PIN for SIM Card %1$d. %2$d Attempts Remaining.
"Please Enter the PIN for SIM Card %1$d. %2$d Attempt Remaining. You'll Need to Contact the Carrier to Help Unlock the Device If It Is Incorrect Again."

plurals.name: kg_password_default_puk_message
plurals.item: SIM is now disabled. Enter PUK code to continue. You have %d remaining attempts before SIM becomes permanently unusable. Contact operator for details.
SIM is now disabled. Enter PUK code to continue. You have %d remaining attempt before SIM becomes permanently unusable. Contact operator for details.

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_pin_code
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM PIN. %d attempts remaining.
"Incorrect SIM PIN. %d attempt remaining. You'll need to contact the carrier to help unlock the device if it is incorrect again."

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_pin_code_multi_sim
plurals.item: Incorrect PIN for SIM Card %1$d. %2$d Attempts Remaining.
"Incorrect PIN for SIM Card %1$d. %2$d Attempt Remaining. You'll Need to Contact the Carrier to Help Unlock the Device If It Is Incorrect Again."

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_puk_code
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM PUK code. %d attempts remaining. SIMs will be permanently disabled if it is incorrect again.
Incorrect SIM PUK code. %d attempt remaining. SIM will be permanently disabled if it is incorrect again.
